info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 7 at 8:12AM PDT until July 8 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Las Vegas NV
info.description:
...A RED FLAG WARNING IS IN EFFECT FOR ZONE 460 TODAY DUE TO LOW HUMIDITY AND STRONG WINDS. A FIRE WEATHER WATCH IS IN EFFECT FOR ZONES 460 & 462 ON TUESDAY FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND STRONG WINDS...
The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening.
* TIMING...from 11 am PDT until 8 pm PDT Monday.
* WIND...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph.
* HUMIDITY...3 to 8 percent.
* IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are expected. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

parameter.value: RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR ESMERALDA COUNTY AND PORTIONS OF NYE COUNTY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR ESMERALDA COUNTY AND PORTIONS OF NYE COUNTY
